content:
Experience what Town & Country Magazine has recognized as the Best Afternoon Tea in New York City!

 In addition to our award-winning Traditional Afternoon Tea, we offer Royal Tea service with Taittinger Champagne.  Inspired by the vibrancy of a beloved tradition, our Tiffin & Tea service features a selection of small bites with Indian & Taj flair! 

On Friday, December 14th and 21st, enjoy our annual Holiday Kids Tea with Santa!  Take your photo with Santa Claus and savor Traditional Afternoon Tea with a holiday twist. $69 per adult, $40 per child. Visit us on Open Table to book. View our complete holiday event calendar here. 

 AFTERNOON TEA MENU 
Make a Reservation
